channel.title: Can you use different ports besides 43594 and 43595?
channel.description:
I have only one step till my new server is online, but my port seems to be used..
I have tried everything o stop it and nothing works.. I even did "Netstat -o" in cmd and nothing was using it..
So are Rs Servers able to run on different ports like 8000? If i go ahead and port forward it and all that?

item.title: Can you use different ports besides 43594 and 43595?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I think you can use any port. Just configure it into your router.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you use different ports besides 43594 and 43595?

item.description:

HOW COULD ANYTHING BE USING THAT TOO?

I only opened up one run…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2009, 05:15:35 pm[/size][hr]If Anyone knows why it is doing this I’d love to know.
